segments.text: The kitchen feels alive with the sound of running water, yet it also feels so still.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman polishing her plate with such focus, completely oblivious to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows larger, a silent warning of what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disgust at the thought of wet cabinets and ruined dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so calm and orderly, contrasting sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s as if the world outside is unaware of the mischief brewing within these walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem excited, and I think they might be tasting freedom, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR
